title: Trevor Talks to Roxane Gay About Her Effort to Provide Financial Relief During the Pandemic
itunes:title: Trevor Talks to Roxane Gay About Her Effort to Provide Financial Relief During the Pandemic
description:
Black Americans get hit hardest by COVID-19, Dulce Sloan roasts the backgrounds of news anchor footage, and Roxane Gay discusses her effort to help during the pandemic crisis.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
